release.action: QuimP: Reworked plugin interfaces to make them compatible with IJ macro. Generate mask can be called from macro. Relevant documentation is in JavaDoc plugin package.
QuimP-BOA: Fixed image scale and frame interval bug.
QuimP-RandomWalk: Many major improvements in Random Walk plugin.
QuimP: Fixed name of IJ tables. Several results can be now presented in native IJ tables.
QuimP: Added support for GSon versioning. Better handling older configurations.
QuimP: Code improvements around plugins, changed package naming, cleaned code.
QuimP-ANA: Fluorescence data can be exported to IJ table for current channel.
QuimP-BOA: Identified problem with plugin, Java-8 update site must be enabled to have vecmath included in IJ classpath.
QuimP-BOA: Fixed problem with cell unzooming on Windows.

QuimP: Paths to image and QCONF file stored in it are now updated on every save. QCONF can be copied now to other location without risk of accidental modifying of old location. QCONF container is regenerated on every save, internal version and date are updated then.
QuimP-ANA: Contour shrinking behavior in ANA.
QuimP: Removed Test QuimP module from menu.
QuimP-BOA: File patch in QCONF was not updated when user changed location of image.
Updates on JavaDoc.
Removed unnecessary fields from QCONF.
Fixed pom.xml for wrong repository name and doclint.
Protrusion Analysis: Fixed tests.
QuimP-RandomWalk: Added option for real time previewing segmentation progress.
QuimP: Added scijava pom as parent pom.
QuimP: Fixed problem with displaying registration window.
QuimP-RandomWalk: Fixed crashing when there is less than 3 nodes left after contour shrinking. It happened when too big shrinking power was used.
QuimP-RandomWalk: Segmentation process does not block UI anymore.
QuimP: Change webpage in quimp info.
QuimP-RandomWalk: Fixed problem when show seeds option was used together with seeding every slice separately (seeds of size of input image).
QuimP-BOA: Fixed bug when user deleted accidentally contour in edit mode and then quit from edit mode.
QuimP-BOA: Fixed double extension when overwriting file.
QuimP-BOA: Zoom selector did not update when QCONF file was loaded.
QuimP-ANA: Ana plugin failed when input image was created in IJ.
QuimP-BOA: BOA crashed when input image was more than one channel.
QuimP: Disabled generation of old files in QuimP modules if QCONF file is loaded.
QuimP: Add convert masks plugin to plugin menu.
QuimP: Possible bug in correct density function.
QuimP: Switch to forked vecmath available in ImageJ jars.
QuimP-RandomWalk: Added object shrinking/expanding using contours.
QuimP: Plugin for rendering masks from QCONF.
Protrusion Analysis: Error when processing multiple cells.
QuimP-BOA: Suppress standard console messages.
QuimP-BOA: Defective snakes are not displayed.
QuimP-BOA: Zoom does not work in all cases.
QuimP-BOA: False message after loading file "The image opened currently in BOA is different".
QuimP-ANA: ANA throws unnecessary exception if no file opened.
QuimP-DIC: DIC failed on 0,90,180,270 deg.
QuimP-ECMM: Batch processing skips _1.snQP files.
QuimP-RandomWalk: Better notification on lack of seed when processing stacks.
QuimP-DIC: DIC does not process stacks.
Protrusion Analysis: Statistics can be previewed in IJ standard measurement window.
QuimP: Use standard IJ logging framework.
QuimP: Add automatic versioning in plugins based on Maven.
QuimP-DIC: Create results as new images.
QuimP-DIC: Add perpendicular averaging.
QuimP: QCONF and paQP side-saved on new file format path contains wrong fluoro datafiles.
QuimP: Support conversion of ANA and Stats data by FormatConverter.
Random Walk: Show user friendly message when input image in wrong format.
QuimP: Disable modules to produce paQP files if new format selected.
QuimP: License could not be displayed in QuimP Bar.
Services: Front-end services work on new server.
BOA: BOA fails if old plugins are available in plugin directory.
QuimP: User can view the license from QuimP Bar. Some unused dependencies removed.
Services: Registration form on web deals with empty fields and white characters.
QuimP: Updated registration text.
QuimP: User can view the registration window from QuimP Bar.
QuimP: Added warning before use of FormatConverter.
QuimP: Fixed Open Image from QuimP Bar on Mac.
QuimP: Updated JavaDoc.
QuimP: Added registration window.
Protrusion Analysis: Added polar plots.
Random Walk plugin reported bad seed colors. It was not a bug but rather lack of proper documentation.
Fixed problem with FormatConverter.
Included javac dependency to solve problem with dependencies removed from Fiji. See this thread: http://forum.imagej.net/t/no-javac-jar-found/2340.
Added simple tool for conversion between paQP and QCONF format.
Protrusion Analysis: Added outline plots.
Protrusion Analysis: Added averaged background images.
Protrusion Analysis: Added export of statistics.
Protrusion Analysis: Added user interface.
Protrusion Tracking: New output images.
Plugin code reworked.
paQP files generated from QCONF contained bad segmentation parameters.
ANA: clear option does not work.
ANA: stored bad paths in QCONF.
Added description of parameters in paQP file.
Rename toolbar menu entry.
Add preselection of active file format.
Protrusion Tracking: New output images.
Deal with problem of restoring image from QCONF file.
Fix of several bugs introduced after issue 196.
Detect whether loaded QCONF file contains any previous data and notify user if it does.
Option for saving outlines as separate image in ANA module.
Allow to load new format to ANA.
Data files in old format (Q111) are always generated when saving in new format (QCONF).
Loading QCONF causes massive exceptions
Add options to clear all snakes and other settings from BOA menu
Allow to load new format to ECMM
Add support of new format QCONF to Q Analysis plugin
Current frame sometimes does not update when action taken in Binary Segmentation plugin.
Binary Segmentation causes errors when snake is modified.
BOA does not ask about file to save on SaveQuit.
Loading QCONF causes massive exceptions sometimes.
Edited snakes are not processed by filters.
Add default log4j configuration file.
Binary segmentation window can be duplicated.
Add about menu in QuimP bar.
Add link to doc from QuimP bar.
Random Walk GUI should offer option of creating of seed image.
BinarySegmentation fails on single slice images.
Binary segmentation should use various sources of masks.
